Welcome & Thanks for visting

For as long as I could remember, I've always found visual storytelling invigorating ranging from many types of books, shows, movies, and magazines. Memories of picking up Kodak prints from Costco's photo department, excited to examine snapshots of the last family gathering. Rewatching 90s Christmas holiday VHS tapes and laughing at how we all use to dress, loving every second of it wishing the tape wouldn't ever end, that feeling of invoking a joyful memory is what I strive to encapsulate.

A laugh today — a memory tomorrow

Capture your unique stories and experiences in time through visual storytelling for your present loved ones and future generations to come.

These are days to remember

Wedding & Engagement

From intimate coast line ceremonies, large inner city venues or just the mains, every wedding has their very own unique feelings. Make your engagement session one to remember with an adventure!

Family Sessions

Summer Sessions now booking!! Fun, efficient, and photographer recommned locations.

Why I photograph

Photogapher

Gilbert A Haro

Growing up staying focused in school was difficult, it was not until my early 20s I finally took on the challenge of photography. Suddenly retaining attention appeared to not be such an obstacle. Photography provided me encouragement, discipline, and a passion for learning. As a kid, I always leaned towards creative thinking patterns that now, 4 years later, have led me to pursue a career around the arts. I have taken on new challenges that include web development along with strengthening my photography techniques. Where ever life takes me, a passion for the arts is my foundation!
